# 10.0 Docs

> Documentation for 10.0 Docs.

- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/10.0/default-http-streaming.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where streaming HTTP responses are enabled by default in browser HTTP clients.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/10.0/http3-disabled-with-publishtrimmed.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where HTTP/3 support is disabled by default when PublishTrimmed or PublishAot is set to true.
- [Breaking change: URI length limits removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/10.0/uri-length-limits-removed.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in networking where URI length limits of around 65K characters have been removed.
